title: Updated: Citing Contract, Bora-Hansgrohe Denies Cian Uijtdebroeks Move to Visma-Lease a Bike
content:
German team says Uijtdebroeks is ‘contractually bound’, but rider’s agent says legal action is ongoing.

Read the full article at Updated: Citing Contract, Bora-Hansgrohe Denies Cian Uijtdebroeks Move to Visma-Lease a Bike on Velo.
author: sstokes
